
I18N WITH VERSIONCHANGE
***********************

Deprecated since version 1.0: THIS IS THE *FIRST* PARAGRAPH OF
DEPRECATED.THIS IS THE *SECOND* PARAGRAPH OF DEPRECATED.

New in version 1.0: THIS IS THE *FIRST* PARAGRAPH OF VERSIONADDED.

Changed in version 1.0: THIS IS THE *FIRST* PARAGRAPH OF
VERSIONCHANGED.
